messages.title: A record of action. A promise of more.
messages.content: With your support on June 8th, Norman will use a 1p increase on all rates of income tax to inject £6 billion each year into our NHS and social care. Reverse cuts to schools and invest £7 billion to ensure no local schools lose teachers or teaching assistants. Fight to protect local jobs and safeguard our local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase income tax by 1p to inject £6 billion each year into NHS and social care.
Reverse cuts to schools and invest £7 billion to prevent local schools from losing teachers or teaching assistants.
Fight to protect local jobs and safeguard the local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't compete in North Norfolk. Elections there are always close between the Lib Dems and Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Safeguard our local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.
issues.economy: Fight to protect local jobs and safeguard the local economy by keeping Britain in the single market.
issues.education: Reverse cuts to schools and invest £7 billion to ensure no local schools lose teachers or teaching assistants.
issues.health: Use a 1p increase on all rates of income tax to inject £6 billion each year into our NHS and social care.
issues.socialWelfare: Inject £6 billion each year into... social care.

politicalExperience.achievements: Norman has built a reputation as a hard-working campaigner.

contactInformation.address: Unit 4, The Garden Centre, Nursery Drive, North Walsham NR28 0DR
